scripts.buildhugo: if [ $(go env GOOS) = 'linux' ] && [ $(go env GOARCH) = 'amd64' ]; then (go clean -C hugo && export AR=llvm-ar-16 CC=clang-16 CXX=clang++-16 && go build -C hugo -ldflags='-s -w' --tags extended -o ../bin/$(go env GOARCH) && upx --best --lzma ./bin/$(go env GOARCH)) ;else echo 'Only for linux/amd64'; fi
scripts.buildtest: npm run buildjs && ./bin/$(go env GOARCH) --gc --minify -d test
scripts.debug: npm run buildjs && ./bin/$(go env GOARCH) server --gc -D --environment production
scripts.deploy: npm run buildjs && rm -f -r docs && ./bin/$(go env GOARCH) --gc --minify && git add docs && git commit -S -s -m 'docs: Re-generate fixes'
